pageInstructions: This utility will help you generate a Holochain Scaffold yaml file. With this file, you can generate the skeleton of a Holochain Application.
zomeEntrySchemaInstructions:
Create the json-schema for your entry. For a more advanced editor, please see
https://jsonschema.net and paste the results back here.
yaml-header: This is a holochain scaffold yaml definition. http://ceptr.org/projects/holochain
field-desc-scaffoldVersion: The hc-scaffold schema version of this file.
field-desc-DNA: The DNA specifies the entry structure and functions and configuration of your application
field-desc-Version: Version indicator for changes to DNA
field-desc-UUID: This ID differentiates your app from others. For example, to tell one Slack team from another which same code.
field-desc-Name: What would you like to call your holochain app?
field-desc-Properties: Properties that you want available across all Zomes.
field-desc-Properties.language: The base (human) language of this holochain app.
field-desc-PropertiesSchemaFile: Describes the entries in the Properties section of your dna file.
field-desc-DHTConfig: Configure the properties of your Distributed Hash Table (e.g. hash algorithm, neighborhood size, etc.).
field-desc-Zomes: List the Zomes your application will support.
field-name-Zomes.Name: Zome Name
field-desc-Zomes.Name: The name of this code module.
field-desc-Zomes.Description: What is the purpose of this module?
field-desc-Zomes.RibosomeType: What scripting language will you code in?
field-desc-Zomes.CodeFile: Points to the main script file for this Zome.
field-desc-Zomes.Entries: Data stored and tracked by your Zome.
field-name-Zomes.Entries.Name: Name
field-desc-Zomes.Entries.Name: The name of this entry.
field-desc-Zomes.Entries.DataFormat: What type of data should this entry store?
field-desc-Zomes.Entries.Sharing: Should this entry be publicly accessible?
field-desc-Zomes.Functions: Functions which can be called in your Zome's API.
field-name-Zomes.Functions.Name: Name
field-desc-Zomes.Functions.Name: The name of this function.
field-desc-Zomes.Functions.CallingType: Data format for parameters passed to this function.
field-desc-Zomes.Functions.Exposure: Level to which is this function exposed.
field-desc-Zomes.Code: The logic that will control Zome behavior
code-callout-header: This stub Zome code file was auto-generated by hc-scaffold
code-function-genesis: Called only when your source chain is generated
code-callout-validation: Validation functions for every change to the local chain or DHT
code-function-pkg: Called to get the data needed to validate
code-function-validate: Called to validate any changes to the local chain or DHT
field-desc-TestSets: Auto-Generated test sets for hcdev package
field-name-TestSets.Name: Name
field-desc-TestSets.Name: Name of the Test Set
field-desc-TestSets.Zome: The zome this test is related to
field-desc-TestSets.Output: Output from the function to validate
